column3: ao Nyankopɔn; Na woana na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔbɛka bi ama me?"

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔwo eyi hɔn akoma efi ntseasee ho esuma: Dɛm ntsi eremma wonndzi mo do nyim."
"Nyia oyi ne mfɛfo ma afonam no
"Nyankopɔn ayɛ mo so ɔman akasabɛbu; Na madan obi a wohinahina n'enyi do ntafi."
"Awerɛhow ntsi m'enyiwa so ayɛ kusukusu; Na m'akwaa nyinara ayɛ dɛ nwinwin."
"Nyimpa a wɔtsen na hɔn ho bɔbow hɔn wɔ yi ho
column3: Na nyia odzi bem no bekenyan noho etsia dabrabanyi."

column2: "Naaso tseneneenyi bosuo no kwan mu ara
column3: Na nyia ne nsa ho tsew no benya ahoɔdzen aka ho:"

column4: na afei hom mbra: Na murunnhu nyansafo biara wɔ hom mu."

column2: "Sɛ mobɔhwɛ samanadze kwan dɛ ɔyɛ me fie; Na matow me mpa wɔ sum mu;"

column3: Ɔwo nye m'egya; Na nsaamaa dɛ

column2: "Na dɛm a m'enyidado wɔ henfa? Ana obi botum ehu m'enyidado?"

column3: obesian nye me akɔ samanadze adaban no mu
column4: Na yɛbɔbɔ mu agye hɛn ahom wɔ huntuma mu."
